QuestData.Title: Wrath of the High Exarch
QuestData.Description: Where the Legion is concerned, violence is always the answer.$b$b<Turalyon hefts his blade with a grim expression.>$b$bThey are between us and Velen. Nothing will stop them from finding him unless we act. Now is not the time to hold back.$b$bTogether we will sow chaos among their ranks.
QuestData.LogDescription: Disrupt the Legion forces in Arinor Gardens.
QuestData.RewardText: If I have learned anything about the Legion, it is that we have no other option but to fight back.$b$bIt was a pleasure to have you at my side.

Objectives.Objective: Disrupt Legion forces in Arinor Gardens
